# Claudiu Cioba

Claudiu Cioba Profile Photo

Founder & CEO [...] The #1 Shopify podcast top brands and operators listen to when they want real growth.  
If you are searching for the best Shopify podcast to scale your store, increase revenue, and join the top 1% of Shopify merchants, you are in the right place.  
  
Every episode delivers a clear 1% improvement you can apply immediately. The show blends interviews with leading Shopify experts, founders, and operators, plus tactical deep dives into what actually works in ecommerce today.  
  
Hosted by Jay Myers, a 15-year Shopify veteran and co-founder of Bold Commerce, Shopify1Percent is built for serious Shopify merchants who want practical advice, not theory, and proven strategies used by the best brands on Shopify

data.title: Videowise's Claudiu Cioba On How to 10x Customer Engagement
data.snippet:
## Meet Claudiu Cioba

Claudiu Cioba is the founder and CEO at Videowise. For the past 14 years, he has led the product designer field, working with the like of Uber and PayJunction.

In 2021, he launched Videowise, his first data-driven video solution for the ecommerce industry. 

His greatest passion is simplifying complex concepts and making them easy for consumers to grasp through video content. 

Connect with Claudiu on:LinkedIn | Twitter

## About Videowise

Videowise is a video platform designed to help Shopify brands engage consumers with interactive shoppable video experiences. With Videowise, you can double site engagement, uplift conversions, and sell more ‚Äî all in one place.

Learn more about Videowise on: LinkedIn | Website

## The Checkout episode 44 unpacks: [...] # Videowise‚Äôs Claudiu Cioba On How to 10x Customer Engagement

#### Discover the power interactive videos have to drive engagement and increase conversions for DTC brands.

21% of consumers who engage with shoppable videos make a purchase. On top of that, 35% of marketers using interactive videos have seen an increase in conversions and sales. 

Brands have a big opportunity to increase customer engagement thanks to interactive videos. So, don‚Äôt miss this fascinating chat between our host, Adii Pienaar, and Claudiu Cioba, founder and CEO of Videowise, where they talk about:

Tune in on: Apple | Google | Spotify

# Claudiu Popa keynote speaker

Claudiu is the founder - since 1989 - of the Informatica Group of Companies, including Datarisk Canada, OTSEC Industrial Cybersecurity and Managed Privacy Canada. He is also the co-founder of Canada's only cybersafety education foundation, KnowledgeFlow. Since 2009, the Foundation has been home to the famous UnHackable brand that empowers Canada's youth to embrace a culture of cybersafety and build a Circle of Trust within their communities. Among other innovations, he is behind the Verify Risk Assessment methodology used by businesses and government agencies across Canada. [...] Claudiu is here today to share this exclusive presentation tailored exclusively to a professional audience but not requiring any technical preparation or expertise, on the emerging threats of new technology, looming risks to our sector and exciting solutions that will give us all a lot more than just a fighting chance: how to gain an unfair advantage in the war on cybercrime.

Design Director at Volkswagen Group Future Center Europe

Design Director at Volkswagen Group Future Center Europe

Writer, Media Strategist, Philosopher, Former Director of Marketing at American...

Professor of Genetic Medicine, Nobel Prize Laureate in Physiology or...

Global Futurist and Exponential Thinker, Corporate Innovator, Serial Entrepreneur and...

Leadership Guru, Professor at Harvard Business School [...] Personally, Claudiu is a family man whose four unruly children continue to amaze him by weaponizing critical thinking, making risk-based decisions (in their favour) and generally demonstrating a propensity for bypassing his home security safeguards. His wife Debra is currently the only MBA in the family and therefore significantly more qualified to managing the day-to-day operations of the KnowledgeFlow Foundation by endlessly maximizing scarce resources and collaborating with a nationwide network of amazing professionals and industry associations to push unique initiatives that continue to create hundreds of UnHackable school groups and Cybersafety Champions across Canada.

data.title: Measuring the ROI of Email with Claudiu Murariu - Userlist
data.snippet:
Facebook Tracking Pixel

# Measuring the ROI of Email with Claudiu Murariu

You‚Äôll learn about the role email plays in a product, how to track the impact of your email, two types of impact from sending a message, and more.

Better Done Than Perfect
Claudiu Murariu

How do you measure the ROI of your emails? In this episode, we talk to Claudiu Murariu, co-founder and CEO of InnerTrends. You‚Äôll learn about the role email plays in a product, how to track the impact of your email, two types of impact from sending a message, and more.

Or use our RSS feed 

## Show Notes üìù

Thanks for listening! If you found the episode useful, please spread the word on Twitter mentioning @userlist, or leave us a review on iTunes.

## Key Learnings üí° [...] ## Key Learnings üí°

In the early stages of his career, Claudiu became obsessed with a thought that still shapes how he sees things today: how to make web projects that actually impact people‚Äôs lives?

He established his first company at the age of 18 and his main service was creating websites for clients. Around that time, only a few companies had websites set up.

When he got to work on the website for the biggest company in their city, Claudiu got very excited. But when he presented the finished website to the client, the CEO was in such a hurry that the meeting became merely transactional: Claudiu was only asked about the cost, he got paid, and that was it. [...] Because he wanted to pursue this question, Claudiu decided to drop out of college to focus on it. At the time, there was no solution addressing the topic and he took it upon himself to learn about it, eventually becoming a usability expert for another company.

As a usability expert, he got very deep into understanding how people use websites. But as he went deeper, he also got more frustrated because study participants would usually take a long time to learn how to use a website or an application:

‚ÄúIt would take months to find something valuable that you can make a decision based on. And that‚Äôs when I discovered data.‚Äù

Since then, Claudiu has been on the data-led road because he realized that data gets you faster to insight than anything else.
